title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for December 2024
description: The puzzle solutions for December 2024. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for December 2024 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today for December 2024, plus the solutions to the other puzzles in the game.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of December 2024. We’re also reveal answers to the regular puzzles and toss-ups throughout today’s show. We will update this article daily, so we recommend that you check back. This week’s shows from December 2 to December 6 will be Fabulous Food Week, so we anticipate that many puzzles will be related to, well, food and cooking. Tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Pier Ali, Layvin Mangnane, and Patty Spano. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for December 3. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Tuesday, December 3, 2024 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – BURGER JOINT [Place] Tossup #1 – NACHO PLATTER [Food & Drink] Tossup #2 – KITCHEN APRON [What Are You Wearing?] Regular Puzzle #1 – RESTAURANT REVIEWS & RATINGS [Same Letter] Regular Puzzle #2 – THROWING A FOOTBALL [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #3 – EXCEPTIONAL CRUISE SHIPS [Things] Tossup #3 – LET’S SCHEDULE A CALL [Phrase] Tossup #4 – HOLD MY CALLS [Phrase] Tossup #5 – I’LL CALL YOU BACK [Phrase] Regular Puzzle #4 – ELECTRIC TOOTHBRUSH [Around the House] And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Monday, December 2: Bonus Round Puzzle – KEEPING BUSY [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #1 – PRIVATE CHEF [Occupation] Tossup #2 – LADY MARMALADE [Song Title] Regular Puzzle #1 – BURSTING WITH FLAVOR [Phrase] Regular Puzzle #2 – LUNCH & SUGGESTION BOX [Show & Tell] Regular Puzzle #3 – SUMO WRESTLERS [People] Tossup #3 – BABY CARRIAGE [Thing] Tossup #4 – BABY NAME [Thing] Tossup #5 – BABY GRAND PIANO [Thing] Regular Puzzle #4 – SENDING A GIFT [What Are You Doing?] The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the December 6 episode. Wheel of Fortune has also brought back the $10,000 Mystery Wedge, where viewers also have a chance to win $10,000 using their SPIN ID for the Wheel Watchers Club. In addition, there’s an upcoming Secret Santa Holiday Giveaway for Wheel Watchers Club members where you can win money and Disney vacations by tuning into the show from December 9 to 20.
html:
Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of December 2024. We’re also reveal answers to the regular puzzles and toss-ups throughout today’s show. We will update this article daily, so we recommend that you check back.

This week’s shows from December 2 to December 6 will be Fabulous Food Week, so we anticipate that many puzzles will be related to, well, food and cooking. Tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Pier Ali, Layvin Mangnane, and Patty Spano. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for December 3.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Tuesday, December 3, 2024 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – BURGER JOINT [Place]
  • Tossup #1 – NACHO PLATTER [Food & Drink]
  • Tossup #2 – KITCHEN APRON [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – RESTAURANT REVIEWS & RATINGS [Same Letter]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – THROWING A FOOTBALL [Fun & Games]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – EXCEPTIONAL CRUISE SHIPS [Things]
  • Tossup #3 – LET’S SCHEDULE A CALL [Phrase]
  • Tossup #4 – HOLD MY CALLS [Phrase]
  • Tossup #5 – I’LL CALL YOU BACK [Phrase]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – ELECTRIC TOOTHBRUSH [Around the House]

And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Monday, December 2:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – KEEPING BUSY [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #1 – PRIVATE CHEF [Occupation]
  • Tossup #2 – LADY MARMALADE [Song Title]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – BURSTING WITH FLAVOR [Phrase]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – LUNCH & SUGGESTION BOX [Show & Tell]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – SUMO WRESTLERS [People]
  • Tossup #3 – BABY CARRIAGE [Thing]
  • Tossup #4 – BABY NAME [Thing]
  • Tossup #5 – BABY GRAND PIANO [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – SENDING A GIFT [What Are You Doing?]

The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the December 6 episode. Wheel of Fortune has also brought back the $10,000 Mystery Wedge, where viewers also have a chance to win $10,000 using their SPIN ID for the Wheel Watchers Club.

In addition, there’s an upcoming Secret Santa Holiday Giveaway for Wheel Watchers Club members where you can win money and Disney vacations by tuning into the show from December 9 to 20.
